definition: dry measure for grain equal to ten dou 斗/ten pecks/one hundred liters
rock/stone/stone inscription/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
magnetic head (of a tape recorder etc)

sentences.english: Used to set the track pre-gap for all tracks in sectors globally.
sentences.chinese: 用來設置爲所有全域磁區內軌道的軌道預先間隙。

sentences.english: They plopped each turtle into a small pool surrounded by magnetic coils.
sentences.chinese: 他們把每個海龜放進有磁線圈圍繞的小池子裏。

sentences.english: The asymmetry was caused by induced magnetic anisotropy aroused by Ion Beam Mixing in magnetic field.
sentences.chinese: 這與在磁場下離子束混合造成的感生磁各向異性有關。

sentences.english: These readings are obtained from a Japanese magnetosphere simulator.
sentences.chinese: 這些讀數來源於“日本磁氣圈模擬器”。

sentences.english: Then the magnetic connection between the cloud and the surrounding medium will be broken.
sentences.chinese: 其時雲和周圍介質間的磁聯繫就終止了。

sentences.english: The error of magnetic compass is not adjusted.
sentences.chinese: 磁羅經的誤差沒有校正。

sentences.english: The tapered coaxial slow-wave-structure is the most important part of a MILO.
sentences.chinese: 漸變型同軸慢波結構是磁絕緣線振盪器的核心部分。

sentences.english: AR bispectrum are put forward for investigating the dynamic characteristics of the magnetorheological vibrant device.
sentences.chinese: 這裏用AR雙譜研究磁流變振動裝置的動態特性。

sentences.english: Magneto bearings transmit axial forces in only one direction.
sentences.chinese: 磁軸承只傳遞一個方向的軸向力。

sentences.english: The possible mass region for these magnetic rotation phenomena is presented.
sentences.chinese: 給出了實驗上可能存在磁轉動帶的核區。

sentences.english: Metal magnetic memory(MMM) testing method can find the stress concentration area.
sentences.chinese: 採用磁記憶無損檢測方法可以檢測出應力集中區。

sentences.english: It has been found that the coercive force is very sensitive to the temperature of isothermal magnetic treatment.
sentences.chinese: 發現矯頑力對恆溫熱磁處理溫度極爲敏感。

sentences.english: The magnetic field should act as a strong brake on a magnetar's rotation.
sentences.chinese: 磁場對超強磁星體的自轉應該是一種強力的煞車。

sentences.english: The coded magnets are available as standard versions, or as strong magnet versions.
sentences.chinese: 磁代碼可以作爲標準版本或者強磁性版本。

sentences.english: The magnetic entropy changes were the benchmark for the application of the magnetocaloric materials.
sentences.chinese: 磁熵變化值是衡量磁製冷材料好壞的一項重要指標。

sentences.chinese: 磁熵變化值是衡量磁製冷材料好壞的一項重要指標。
